channel.title: Hey im wondering can u do this on a ps?
channel.description: okay im wondering if u can make n uber item ( like super d chain ) and if u can can u make it so only mods can have it? or wield it?

item.source: Hey im wondering can u do this on a ps?

item.title: Hey im wondering can u do this on a ps?
item.dc:creator: @c4td0g_pwnz_j00 c4td0g pwnz j00
item.description:
@c4td0g_pwnz_j00 wrote:

;D Hi mate, [glow=green,2,300]I’ll help you out here[/glow]

[glow=red,2,300]THIS IS ONLY FOR PIMPSCAPE!!![/glow]

OK! so here we go… u want a [glow=black,2,300]UBER[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]Dragon Chainbody[/glow] Right?.. Yes… SO! 1stly Click on client.Java (if u dnt know wat this is, dnt even bother making ur own server…) Find (Ctrl+F):

if (command.startsWith("ring") && playerRights >= 2) {

It should come up with something like this:

if (command.startsWith("ring") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(773, 1); sendMessage("USE THIS MOTHER FUCKER WISELY!!!"); }

OK, now see the last “}”? hit enter after that… and put THIS in

if (command.startsWith("uberdchain") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(3140, 1); sendMessage("The ULTIMATE piece of armour! Go pwn some noobz0rz!!!"); }

Okay so that’ll give you the Dchain… [glow=red,2,300]ONLY FOR ADMINS AND ABOVE[/glow]… if you want for MODS and above you change the:

if (command.startsWith("ring") && playerRights >= 2)

CHANGE THE “2” Into a “1” without the " around it…

SO! the first part of the god damn code is done (the command)… now u gotta change the whole Dchain itself (THAT MEANS - if u only want MODS/ADMINS+ using it U CANNOT GIVE IT TO NORMAL PLAYERS… which will mean u will have to take it out of tha shop in pimpscape also… and replace it with something similar, if u want…)

OK! Now actually making the Uber Dchain…
1stly, go to “item.cfg”… ok the item.cfg has the colorful icon above it that looks like the “windows” icon.

Next, hit Ctrl + F… (To SEARCH) and search this:

Dragon_chainbody

It should look something like this when u searched it…

item = 3140[]	Dragon_chainbody[]	A_series_of_connected_metal_rings.[]	148195.415050151[]	148195.415050151[]	198945.35621087[]	0[]	0[]	0[]	-15[]	0[]	81[]	93[]	98[]	-3[]	82[]	0[]	0

OK… see the []'s? They are actually TABBED (the 'Tab key) spaces, u must use them each time u separate something in item.cfg… See those FIRST THREE numbers after the description of the Dchain? well DO NOT touch them… now, the numbers after the first three indicate DEF and ATK bonuses… it has no STR or prayer bonus… if u want Dchain similar to the ‘perfect_ring’ do this:

item = 3140[]	Dragon_chainbody[]	A_series_of_connected_metal_rings.[]	148195.415050151[]	148195.415050151[]	198945.35621087[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000[]	10000

OK! DONT COPY AND PASTE IT!!! See the last TWO “10000’s”? Well, copy and paste everything apart from the last two numbers including the space in between the 3rd last and 2nd last. NOW! after you’ve pasted that, hit the ‘Tab’ key and write the two “10000’s” there… REMEMBER - REPLACE THE []'s WITH TABS OKAY??? OTHERWISE U’LL STUFF EVERYTHING UP AND U’LL REGRET IT!!!

Save the item.cfg, Click compile, then… TA-DA!!! IT SHOULD HAVE +10000 TO EVERYTHING - MAKING IT AND UBER D-CHAIN!!! ONLY FOR MODS/ADMINS+ (whatever you decided).

OKAY NEARLY DONE!.. now to delete the shop item from santa’s shop… HERE WE GO…

okay, click shops.cfg. Find:

santa's_holiday_stuff

Now, Find, again:

3140

OK, u should see that number and a tabbed number after it (the number “1”):

shop = 31	santa's_holiday_stuff				2	2	7336	1	7462	1	3105	1	1048	1	1050	1	1038	1	1040	1	1042	1	1044	1	1046	1	1037	1	1057	1	1055	1	1053	1	6611	1	1961	1	1959	1	1187	1	3140	1	4087	1	4585	1	1149	1	6858	1	6860	1	6862	1	6856	1	6859	1	6861	1	6863	1	6857	1	4084	100

Well delete the "3140:(which is the Dchain) and delete the number “1” after it including the tabbed line separated the number “1” BEFORE the “3140”. Remeber - delete ALL the []'s and replace with TAB.

::Explanation - The 3140 is the actual Dchain from the shop. The number “1” IS THE STOCK OF Dchains in the shop. Therefore, deleting both will make the Dchain dissapear completely out of “santas_holiday_stuff”.

NOW it should look like this:

shop = 31	santa's_holiday_stuff				2	2	7336	1	7462	1	3105	1	1048	1	1050	1	1038	1	1040	1	1042	1	1044	1	1046	1	1037	1	1057	1	1055	1	1053	1	6611	1	1961	1	1959	1	1187	1	4087	1	4585	1	1149	1	6858	1	6860	1	6862	1	6856	1	6859	1	6861	1	6863	1	6857	1	4084	100

Well, without the []'s, you should have deleted them and replaced them with TABs… (unless they’re already TABBED!!! :eek: then leave it )

NOW! When mods/admins type ::uberdchain it should get an awesome piece of armor!!! There you go mate, ENJOY! ;D

CoughREP++Cough… took me 20 mins… NOT leeched. I was bored so i took the liberty to create this helpful tut…

Read full topic

item.title: Hey im wondering can u do this on a ps?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Making people who only have a certain playerrights be able to wield something? Easy, just put a conditional statement in the item equipping part

Don’t ask me how to do it - if you can’t figure it out on your own, theres no point in you knowing.

Read full topic
